bn.core

Interface Domain

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Value>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BooleanDomain, Domain

    public interface Domain
extends java.lang.Iterable<Value>
    The domain of a RandomVariable is a set of Values.

    This is a subset of the Set interface (we could just extend Set\<Value> instead). Note that in the Set interface, contains() and remove() take Objects as parameters,rather than whatever the element type is (Value in this case). Not sure why that is...

    See Also:
    https://stackoverflow.com/questions/104799/why-arent-java-collections-remove-methods-generic
